text:
I use beanshell preprocessor, and define a msgCorrelation_ID variable
--
Parameters:
${__RandomString(10,abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz0123456789,)}
-- 
Scripts:
vars.put("msgCorrelation_ID", Parameters);
--

then use the JMS JMS point-to-point sampler,and specify the JMS selector. JMSCorrelationID='${msgCorrelation_ID}'

but the ${msgCorrelation_ID} doesn't get replaced. it should be replaced to the dynamic string. 

Thanks
Terry
creator: terry.chiu.123@gmail.com

text:
Bugzilla is not a support forum.

Please subscribe to the JMeter user list and ask there.
creator: sebb@apache.org
newsletter@rosenfelder.ch
text:
IMHO this is a valid bug report, and not a support request.
I'm having the same issue, variables in the Content field are replaced, but not in the JMS Selector field.

Regards,
Angelo
